API_Key.description: The Apptentive API key for your app. This key can be found under the Settings tab for your app on www.apptentive.com.

Debug_Mode.description: Enables verbose logging. Leaving this on in production can affect performance.

Initially_Use_Message_Center.description: If you choose to disable Message Center from the server, you can un-check this setting to make sure Message Center cannot be displayed until after the client checks with the server.

Initially_Hide_Apptentive_Branding.description: If you choose to hide Apptentive branding from the server, you can check this setting to make sure branding is not displayed until after the client checks with the server.

App_ID.description: The Apple iOS App Store ID. If you are building for iOS, this is required.

iOS_Tint_Color.description: An optional hex color string consisting of one byte each for alpha-layer, red, green, and blue. For example, here is semi-transparent yellow: #7FFFFF00.
